title.zh: 开发版第620周发布公告（小米澎湃OS开发版多机型推送）
title.en: DEV for week 620 (HyperOS DEV released for various devices.)

description.zh: Xiaomi 14 Pro、Xiaomi 14 的小米澎湃OS开发版，本周发版时间已由11月24日提前至11月20日起陆续推送更新，欢迎升级至最新版本体验。
description.en: This week's HyperOS DEV release date for Xiaomi 14 & Pro has been adjusted to Nov.20, welcome to the Hyper updates.

description.zh: Xiaomi 13 Ultra、Xiaomi 13 Pro、Xiaomi 13、Redmi K60 Pro、Redmi K60的小米澎湃OS开发版，本周发版时间已由11月24日提前至11月21日起陆续推送更新，欢迎升级至最新版本体验。
description.en: This week's HyperOS DEV release date for for Xiaomi 13 Ultra, Xiaomi 13 Pro,Xiaomi 13, Redmi K60 Pro, Redmi K60 has been adjusted to Nov.21, welcome to the Hyper updates.

description.zh: Xiaomi MIX Fold 3、Xiaomi MIX Fold 2的小米澎湃OS开发版，已按期完成开发测试工作，将于11月21日起陆续推送开发版更新，欢迎升级体验
description.en: HyperOS DEV release date for Xiaomi MIX Fold 3 and Xiaomi MIX Fold 2 has been adjusted to Nov.21, releases will be ready soon, welcome to the Hyper updates.

attention.zh: 升级前请您务必备份好重要数据
attention.en: Please make sure you've backed up your data before the update.

attention.zh: 具体功能请以手机端展示日志为准
attention.en: Please refer to the logs on the phone for specific updates.

log.zh: 修复 部分场景下状态栏颜色显示异常的问题
log.en: Fixed the issue of abnormal color display in the status bar in some scenarios

log.zh: 修复 部分场景下打开应用图标异常放大的问题
log.en: Fixed the issue of abnormal enlargement of the application icon when opening it in some scenarios

log.zh: 修复 触感演示动画与振动不同步的问题
log.en: Fixed the issue causing touch demonstration is not synchronized with vibrations

log.zh: 修复 部分场景下开启迷你小窗后黑屏的问题
log.en: Fixed the black screen issue after opening mini window in some scenarios

log.zh: 修复 部分主题下控制中心亮度和音量控制组件丢失的问题
log.en: Fixed the issue of missing brightness and volume control components in the Control center while applying some themes

log.zh: 修复 经典控制中心样式下亮度条显示异常的问题
log.en: Fix the issue of abnormal display of the brightness controller under the classic Control center style

log.zh: 修复 控制中心和通知栏切换动画卡顿的问题
log.en: Fix the problem of stuttering animation while switching between Control center and Notification bar
